alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:17PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Roger Mills and west central Beckham Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 517 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Allison to 3 miles southwest of Sweetwater to 4 miles west of Texola. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sweetwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
